016package org.vafer.jdeb.mapping;
017
018import java.io.BufferedReader;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.io.InputStream;
021import java.io.InputStreamReader;
022import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.regex.Matcher;
026import java.util.regex.Pattern;
027
028import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveEntry;
029
030/**
031 * Reads permissions and ownerships from a "ls -laR &gt; mapping.txt" dump and
032 * maps entries accordingly.
033 */
034public final class LsMapper implements Mapper {
035
036    private final Map<String, TarArchiveEntry> mapping;
037
038
039    public final static class ParseError extends Exception {
040
041        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
042
043        public ParseError( String message ) {
044            super(message);
045        }
046    }
047
048
049    public LsMapper( final InputStream pInput ) throws IOException, ParseError {
050        mapping = parse(pInput);
051    }
052
053    /*
054./trunk/target/test-classes/org/vafer/dependency:
055total 176
056drwxr-xr-x   23 tcurdt  tcurdt   782 Jun 25 03:48 .
057drwxr-xr-x    3 tcurdt  tcurdt   102 Jun 25 03:48 ..
058-rw-r--r--    1 tcurdt  tcurdt  2934 Jun 25 03:48 DependenciesTestCase.class
059-rw-r--r--    1 tcurdt  tcurdt   786 Jun 25 03:48 JarCombiningTestCase$1.class
060-rw-r--r--    1 tcurdt  tcurdt  2176 Jun 25 03:48 WarTestCase.class
061drwxr-xr-x    4 tcurdt  tcurdt   136 Jun 25 03:48 classes
062
063./trunk/target/test-classes/org/vafer/dependency/classes:
064     */
065
066    final private Pattern basePattern = Pattern.compile("^\\./(.*):$");
067    final private Pattern totalPattern = Pattern.compile("^total ([0-9]+)$");
068    final private Pattern dirPattern = Pattern.compile("^d([rwx-]{9})\\s+([0-9]+)\\s+(\\S*)\\s+(\\S*)\\s+([0-9]+)\\s+(.*)\\s+[.]{1,2}$");
069    final private Pattern filePattern = Pattern.compile("^([d-])([rwx-]{9})\\s+([0-9]+)\\s+(\\S*)\\s+(\\S*)\\s+([0-9]+)\\s+(.*)\\s+(.*)$");
070    final private Pattern newlinePattern = Pattern.compile("$");
071
072    private String readBase( final BufferedReader reader ) throws IOException, ParseError {
073        final String line = reader.readLine();
074        if (line == null) {
075            return null;
076        }
077        final Matcher matcher = basePattern.matcher(line);
078        if (!matcher.matches()) {
079            throw new ParseError("expected base line but got \"" + line + "\"");
080        }
081        return matcher.group(1);
082    }
083
084    private String readTotal( final BufferedReader reader ) throws IOException, ParseError {
085        final String line = reader.readLine();
086        final Matcher matcher = totalPattern.matcher(line);
087        if (!matcher.matches()) {
088            throw new ParseError("expected total line but got \"" + line + "\"");
089        }
090        return matcher.group(1);
091    }
092
093    private TarArchiveEntry readDir( final BufferedReader reader, final String base ) throws IOException, ParseError {
094        final String current = reader.readLine();
095        final Matcher currentMatcher = dirPattern.matcher(current);
096        if (!currentMatcher.matches()) {
097            throw new ParseError("expected dirline but got \"" + current + "\"");
098        }
099
100        final String parent = reader.readLine();
101        final Matcher parentMatcher = dirPattern.matcher(parent);
102        if (!parentMatcher.matches()) {
103            throw new ParseError("expected dirline but got \"" + parent + "\"");
104        }
105
106        final TarArchiveEntry entry = new TarArchiveEntry(base, true);
107
108        entry.setMode(convertModeFromString(currentMatcher.group(1)));
109        entry.setUserName(currentMatcher.group(3));
110        entry.setGroupName(currentMatcher.group(4));
111
112        return entry;
113    }
114
115
116    private int convertModeFromString( final String mode ) {
117
118        final char[] m = mode.toCharArray();
119        /*
120           -rwxrwxrwx
121
122           4000    set-user-ID-on-execution bit
123           2000    set-user-ID-on-execution bit
124           1000    sticky bit
125           0400    allow read by owner.
126           0200    allow write by owner.
127           0100    execute / search
128           0040    allow read by group members.
129           0020    allow write by group members.
130           0010    execute / search
131           0004    allow read by others.
132           0002    allow write by others.
133           0001    execute / search
134         */
135        // TODO: simplified - needs fixing
136        int sum = 0;
137        int bit = 1;
138        for (int i = m.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
139            if (m[i] != '-') {
140                sum += bit;
141            }
142            bit += bit;
143        }
144        return sum;
145    }
146
147    private TarArchiveEntry readFile( final BufferedReader reader, final String base ) throws IOException, ParseError {
148
149        while (true) {
150            final String line = reader.readLine();
151
152            if (line == null) {
153                return null;
154            }
155
156            final Matcher currentMatcher = filePattern.matcher(line);
157            if (!currentMatcher.matches()) {
158                final Matcher newlineMatcher = newlinePattern.matcher(line);
159                if (newlineMatcher.matches()) {
160                    return null;
161                }
162                throw new ParseError("expected file line but got \"" + line + "\"");
163            }
164
165            final String type = currentMatcher.group(1);
166            if (type.startsWith("-")) {
167                final TarArchiveEntry entry = new TarArchiveEntry(base + "/" + currentMatcher.group(8), true);
168
169                entry.setMode(convertModeFromString(currentMatcher.group(2)));
170                entry.setUserName(currentMatcher.group(4));
171                entry.setGroupName(currentMatcher.group(5));
172
173                return entry;
174            }
175        }
176
177    }
178
179    private Map<String, TarArchiveEntry> parse( final InputStream pInput ) throws IOException, ParseError {
180        final Map<String, TarArchiveEntry> mapping = new HashMap<>();
181
182        final BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(pInput, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
183
184        boolean first = true;
185        while (true) {
186
187            final String base;
188            if (first) {
189                base = "";
190                first = false;
191            } else {
192                base = readBase(reader);
193                if (base == null) {
194                    break;
195                }
196            }
197
198            readTotal(reader);
199            final TarArchiveEntry dir = readDir(reader, base);
200            mapping.put(dir.getName(), dir);
201
202            while (true) {
203                final TarArchiveEntry file = readFile(reader, base);
204
205                if (file == null) {
206                    break;
207                }
208
209                mapping.put(file.getName(), file);
210            }
211        }
212
213        return mapping;
214    }
215
216    public TarArchiveEntry map( final TarArchiveEntry pEntry ) {
217        final TarArchiveEntry entry = mapping.get(pEntry.getName());
218        if (entry != null) {
219            return entry;
220        }
221        return pEntry;
222    }
223
224}
